meanings.definition: A type of plant with cylindrical, brush-like flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful bottlebrushes swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted some bottlebrushes in my backyard to attract hummingbirds.
meanings.sent3: The bottlebrushes in the park seemed to be dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was a tangle of bottlebrushes after playing in the field.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red bottlebrushes stood out among the green foliage.

meanings.definition: A tool used for cleaning bottles.
meanings.sent1: I used a bottlebrush to clean the narrow neck of the glass bottle.
meanings.sent2: The bartender reached for a bottlebrush to scrub the wine decanter.
meanings.sent3: The bottlebrush made the task of cleaning the vase much easier.
meanings.sent4: She scrubbed the baby bottle with the bottlebrush until it sparkled.
meanings.sent5: The bristles of the bottlebrush effectively removed the stains from the flask.

meanings.definition: A type of shrub or tree with cylindrical, brush-like flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bottlebrushes in the botanical garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent2: The backyard was shaded by a tall bottlebrush tree with crimson flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bottlebrush shrub in the corner of the yard added a pop of color.
meanings.sent4: The bottlebrushes in the forest resembled red torches in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the bottlebrush flowers filled the air with sweetness.
